rules: Rule1: Provided that maintenance is complete for device2, maintenance is complete for device1.
Rule2: If facility1 requires testing with device1, then should organization1 not be compliant, drug1 becomes contaminated.
Rule3: Whenever facility1 requires testing with device2, under the condition that organization1 is not compliant, drug1 is contaminated.
Rule4: If organization1 has approved facility1, then either facility1 requires testing with device1 or facility1 requires testing with device2.
Rule5: Provided that organization1 has certified facility1, organization1 has approved facility1.
Rule6: Either device1 is operational, or facility1 requires testing with device1, or facility1 requires testing with device2.
Rule7: If device2 is operational, then it is not the case that device1 is operational.
Rule8: Under the condition that game1 is scheduled at facility1, maintenance is complete for device2.
Rule9: Whenever maintenance is complete for device1, device2 is operational.
Rule10: If organization1 is not compliant, then drug1 is not contaminated.
facts: Fact2: Game1 is scheduled at facility1.
